short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smart todo list extension for your productivity. Stores data locally and synch accross devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start your day by setting Top 5 Things you want to do today; You can set more than 5 to dos.
Get this smart todo list management extension with a sleek and intuitive design.

"Your Data, Your Control". The extension manages all your data within the browser but you can access same data across your signed in devices.

A perfect tool for increasing your productivity. It's completely free and doesn't need you to sign up anywhere. 

Of course, you can store as many todos as you want. 5 Things is a recommendation count. You have full control.

Feature List:
- Add new todo item
- Check/Uncheck your todo items
- Delete todo item
- Scrollable list
- Synchs across your signed in devices
- Stores data locally
- Support more than 5 todos

Feel free to request contact us with feature suggestion. Let's get productive.
